section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Capital project" means a project for which funds are spent for:
the construction, reconstruction, or rehabilitation of a transportation facility, as defined in § 3-101(l) of the Transportation Article; or
capital equipment as defined by the Secretary of Transportation.
"Major capital project" has the meaning stated in § 2-103.1 of the Transportation Article.
"Modal administration" has the meaning stated in § 1-101 of the Transportation Article.

text.section: Except for an emergency project, the Department of Transportation, including the Office of the Secretary and the modal administrations, may not use an appropriation for a major capital project for any capital project that was not included in the Consolidated Transportation Program when the appropriation was made.
